Blank line between items

When a blank line exists between two list items, only those list items should have paragraphs. All the others should be inline.

Blank line in an item

When an item has multiple paragraphs, only that item sholud have paragraphs.

Blank line in a nested list

When any nested lists in an item has paragraphs, that item should also have paragraphs.
